title: WTB PSA graded N172 Old Judge - Any player
author: JohnnyKilroy

posts.post_title: WTB PSA graded N172 Old Judge - Any player
posts.post_content:
Hi there-

I’m putting together a display piece of baseball card history.  I’m looking for a good representation of the N172 Old Judge.  PSA for OCD purposes. :D. Not looking for a big ticket bank breaker.  Let me know if you have anything!
Bump this one up.  Still looking for a PSA N172 OJ card.
